content.raw: This is the approach we took for `joint_feedback`. I think a better approach is to create sdf_1.5 and a conversion XML file that will automatically convert the SDF values. This has the benefit of telling people that they are using a deprecated version of SDF, and it will maintain compatibility.
content.html: This is the approach we took for joint_feedback. I think a better approach is to create sdf_1.5 and a conversion XML file that will automatically convert the SDF values. This has the benefit of telling people that they are using a deprecated version of SDF, and it will maintain compatibility.
